sentences.en: He sought every opportunity to retaliate against his enemy.
sentences.cn: 他找机会向他的敌人报复.
如果受到攻击,他会报复.

sentences.en: How can you be so passive? Why do not you retaliate?
sentences.cn: 你怎麽能如此被动? 你为什麽不报复?

sentences.en: However, he hinted that exchanges retained the capacity to retaliate.
sentences.cn: 但他暗示说,交易所保留了报复的能力.

sentences.en: I start to silence start extremely, I must retaliate.
sentences.cn: 我开始沉默开始偏激, 我要报复.

sentences.en: I was sorely tempted to retaliate.
If you are rude to me, I shall retaliate with equal rudeness.
sentences.cn: 如果你对我无礼, 我就以同样的无礼予以回敬.

sentences.en: If you strike me, I shall retaliate.
sentences.cn: 你要是打我, 我就还击.

sentences.en: No one may suppress such complaints , charges and exposures, or retaliate against the citizens making them.
sentences.cn: 任何人不得压制和打击报复.

sentences.en: The militia responded by saying it would retaliate against any attacks.
sentences.cn: 民兵组织回复说他们会对任何进攻予以反击。

sentences.en: They tried to get the harpoon into the ray before the sting tail came lashing over to retaliate.
sentences.cn: 他们试图把鱼叉刺进鳐鱼体内，以防它猛摆那蜇人的尾巴报复。

sentences.en: Why did the aliens not retaliate against the oppression from mankind?
sentences.cn: 为什么外星人不向人类的压迫发起反抗?

sentences.en: Would Wainwright find some way to retaliate within the bank?
sentences.cn: 温赖特会不会在银行内部寻衅报复 呢 ?

sentences.en: You will also notice the Auto Retaliate button.
sentences.cn: 你还会自动通知报复按钮.

trans.tran_en: to do something bad to someone because they have done something bad to you
to do something bad to someone because they have done something bad to you
